reviews.author: Kelly Machnik
reviews.review: Sehome Court has been a really great place to live for the past four years. The owner and maintenance person are very helpful and responsive. The property is well kept. Maintenance issues are handled immediately. The price is very

reviews.author: Jahnel Burgess
reviews.review: Lived in the apartments for 2.5 years and loved it. Very clean and there is an on site maintenance person who will fix any emergency issues and also keep up on all ongoing projects to improve living conditions. Neighbors were kind and respectful, appreciated how the owner screened tenants well. Would highly recommend

reviews.author: Cat Lasswell
reviews.review: Wonderful apartments! Large and affordable with wonderful staff and maintenance crew. I love that it was pet friendly and even includes basic comcast in the rent! One of the best places i've rented from in Bellingham, hands down.

reviews.author: Full Moon
